title: Idea on how to fix leaver buster
body:
Leaver buster has been what has stopped rage quits and trolls all this time, but it's effectiveness against rage quit and trolls isn't that great but still punishes people who leave games because life is more important than entertainment (imo).

I think by making it so that when a player leaves a game prematurely, he/she is punished immediately in the next game by queue time penalty instead of 5 games of however long penalty you have. This way people that leave games because life happens aren't severely punished, but rage quitter and trolls who are likely to play again once the game ends are punished. Moreover the penalty time can be increased as it's only one queue penalty.

I hope this is considered as I know that you know that leaver buster isn't perfect and will probably never be but this will get it somewhere.
